title: Loyalty Details
description: Loyalty details such as ID, points, join date, program, and status.

xdm:loyalty.description: Captures details related to the customer's loyalty rewards.

xdm:joinDate.title: Program Join Date
xdm:joinDate.description: Date which the visitor registered for the loyalty program.

xdm:loyaltyID.title: Program ID
xdm:loyaltyID.description: The loyalty program ID(s) associated with a specific user, if they are enrolled in the client's loyalty program.

xdm:points.title: Program Points Balance
xdm:points.description: Current balance of the loyalty points/awards in a visitor's loyalty account.

xdm:pointsExpiring.title: Points Expiring
xdm:pointsExpiring.description: Point balance expiring as of the associated expiration date.

xdm:pointsExpirationDate.description: Date on which the given portion of the loyalty points expire.

xdm:pointsRedeemed.title: Points Redeemed
xdm:pointsRedeemed.description: Amount of points applied toward a purchase or otherwise redeemed.

xdm:program.title: Program Name
xdm:program.description: This should define the loyalty progam in which a visitor is enrolled.

xdm:upgradeDate.title: Upgrade Date
xdm:upgradeDate.description: Date which the customer was upgraded to the next tier level.

xdm:status.title: Status
xdm:status.description: Captures the visitor's loyalty progam status, such as active, disabled, or suspended.

xdm:tier.title: Tier
xdm:tier.description: Captures the loyalty progam tier in which a visitor is enrolled.

xdm:tierExpiryDate.title: Tier Expiry Date
xdm:tierExpiryDate.description: Date when the customer's current loyalty tier expires.

xdm:adjustedPoints.title: Adjusted Points
xdm:adjustedPoints.description: Points that have been adjusted due to corrections, returns, or other modifications.

xdm:cardsDetails.title: Loyalty Cards Details

xdm:number.title: Card Number
xdm:number.description: The loyalty card number or identifier.

xdm:series.title: Card Series
xdm:series.description: The series or collection the loyalty card belongs to.

xdm:status.title: Card Status
xdm:status.description: Current status of the loyalty card (active, inactive, suspended, etc.).

xdm:cardsDetails.description: Details about the user's loyalty cards, if any.

xdm:expiredPoints.title: Expired Points
xdm:expiredPoints.description: Total number of points that have expired and are no longer available for use.

xdm:lifetimePoints.title: Lifetime Points
xdm:lifetimePoints.description: Total points earned by the customer throughout their entire loyalty program membership.

xdm:lifetimePurchases.title: Lifetime Purchases
xdm:lifetimePurchases.description: Total monetary value of all purchases made by the customer throughout their loyalty program membership.

xdm:promisedPoints.title: Promised Points
xdm:promisedPoints.description: Points that have been promised but not yet credited to the customer's account.

xdm:returnedPoints.title: Returned Points
xdm:returnedPoints.description: Points that have been returned to the customer's account due to refunds or adjustments.
